pkgmetadata.longdescription: Financial Projections and Planning for Health Care Practices // Provides a shiny interface for a free, open-source managerial accounting-like system for health care practices. This package allows health care administrators to project revenue with monthly adjustments and procedure-specific boosts up to a 3-year period. Granular data (patient-level) to aggregated data (department- or hospital-level) can all be used as valid inputs provided historical volume and revenue data is available. For more details on managerial accounting techniques, see Brewer et al. (2015, ISBN:9780078025792).
